message.raw:
Tab colour is now made red when an error state is present. Issues detailed below:

* If you move a tab the tab colour goes away. Need to make DragDropTabWidget preserve this (and similar details).
* Need to distinguish between not responding and error state, so people don't freak out when a tab takes a little while to program.
